name: {InsertNameHere} (Visual Novel)
description:
Created by one person....

A DEMO!!

(REALLY COOL - Classmates)

Has many choices and has many references for a demo!

Play and say what you think about it

Sooo.... I would like to add stuff.... This is a rly fun experience but I need artists and more time to develop a better story for the game. I do have the ending ready and a lot of references too but still, many will agree that this is hard and I look up to many game developers! I don't know when will I go and add stuff but you guys will be the first to be informed!
OHH!!! and you might as well follow me on twitter! To hear about my other projects and be notified even early! - https://twitter.com/AnimeGeekGamer
